summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, a warrior wandering through the desert comes upon a group of settlers who are being menaced by a murderous gang that is after the water they control.
cast: Patrick Swayze|Lisa Niemi|Anthony Zerbe|Christopher Neame|Brion James|John Fujioka|Brett Hool|Marcel van Heerden|Arnold Vosloo|James Whyle|Russel Savadier|Joseph Ribeiro|Alex Heyns|Brad Morris|Tullio Moneta|David Sherwood
title: El guerrero del amanecer
